snippet.title: The Garden Awakens | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Something stirs in the pale garden! Play the Garden Awakens drop today in Minecraft and explore a biome that's sleepy during the day – and a little unsettling at night. Follow the trail of blooming eyeblossoms deeper into the darkness and you might come face to face with a creaking, a hostile mob with more than a few secrets... Muster up your courage to mine resin from pale oak trees, build with new blocks, add a new resin trim to your armor, or hunt for creaking hearts. Play today in Minecraft – and check out Minecraft Monthly and https://www.minecraft.net tomorrow for more unexpected surprises!

Listen to the tracks on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/6WgVqbzckqwvKBUczpAL07?si=uCVh6kqZSwm7de6VebjARA
